reviews.review: Absolutely inspiring game, fantastic locations, and incredible facial animation. Despite it's aging visual it still holds it's charm and is an excellent experience.
Melhor game de todos os tempos.

Sin dudas unos de los mejores juegos de acción de primera persona <3 y recomiendo mucho si sos re pro o tenes un poco de experiencia en los juegos shooters, pasartelo en la ultima dificultad que es modo Difícil, es un poco jodido, yo me la dí vuelta en esa dificultad y tuve que guardar y cargar varias veces partida ya que esos hdp me hacían mier... jajaj pero re piola el juego la verdad, Salu2 :)
games wish they were as timeless as this

a game that both underwhelms and impresses, but overall ends up meeting the standards that such a pioneering game like half-life deserves. On one hand, I really enjoy the dynamic setpieces, the more fleshed-out characters, impressive graphics and real time physics, as well as the expertly crafted level design that matches anything the original half-life had to offer, but it feels like a step backwards in some ways, such as the running mechanic, the dumbed down AI, the missing atmosphere that made the original game so special, and a story that in my opinion is somewhat bland. Its not bad by any means, even as a sequel to the original half-life,  just not as perfect as the general public makes it out to be.

8/10
Bastante entretenido y se puede jugar desde una pc básica, asi que el juego es áltamente recomendable (Y)

Playing Half Life 2 now, for some reason, just makes me appreciate this gem of a game even more. The graphics are astounding considering when this game was developed, the game design and story is compelling, certain levels keep you on your toes and others make you breathe a sigh of relief after being stuck in a dark whole with creepy-crawlies everywhere. Very excited for the new game that was announced with Alyx as the lead. But I still want Gabe to count to 3 one of these days.
La experiencia de juego lo es TODO
Epic fps. Great compatibility. Runs great even on lower end hardware. Highly recommended.
A true classic, should always be remembered

Don't exactly know what to say, that has not already been said about this game... well, except for maybe the fact that the recent hype for HL:A brought me back to this and I am having  the time of my life having a go at this once again.
first time playing the game all the way through, since it first came out. still amazing 15 years later.

Gordon freeman is back, play to kill Dr. Breen

Half-life 2, le bébé qui, il y a 15 ans a révolutionné l'industrie du jeu vidéo, pour la première fois ont pouvait interagir avec tout un tas d'objets de l'environnement pour résoudre des problèmes qui semble évident aujourd'hui, mais la première fois en ce temps la (que les moins de vingt ans ne peuvent pas connaitre) c'était une tuerie :) La physique et la gravité au service du joueur.

Ce qui est bon c'est de voir comment Steam / Valve a rallumé le feu sous la marmite vidéo-ludique de ce qui l'as fait devenir ce qu'il est aujourd'hui (+1pt en valeur cognitive).
J'en ai déjà l'eau à la bouche, terrifié et impatient de voir ce que le devenir de tout ça va être.
If you have a brain cell you will like it

This game is a classic by all measures.  Even if you've already vicarously experienced it through cultural osmosis, it's still worth buying, because you get not only the game itself, but access to tons of user-created mods and mappacks.
Однозначно лучшая игра в истории и самая любимая 100 из 10

Games that should be on your library initially:

1. Half life 2 (common sense really)
2. Left 4 Dead 1 & 2
3. Payday 2

if your parents won't let you buy this game, call child protective services

if you're 18+ and still haven't bought it, go to therapy, then buy the game
Отлично играется даже спустя много лет. Всем советую к покупке и прохождению.
Great game that far surpasses the original Half-Life.

这是我一生中玩过最漫长乏味的游戏之一，相比同时期的光环2缺少太多亮点，奇怪的模型碰撞，地上一个小物件都可以卡住你但不严重，停顿的载入点让人心烦，除了重力枪有点意思就是不停的射射射，让人乏味。毫无痛感的敌人，没有一点受到伤害时的反应，毫无亮点的武器，团队控制感觉就是挡子弹，好在游戏操作还是不错，中文配音很棒，我个人感觉现在很多的中文配音游戏也没这个配的好，本来想买半条命：艾利克斯，但是没有中文配音，（毕竟奥美倒闭了）。连续射了9个小时还没通关，整个人都虚了，感觉被掏空。相比第二章，重力枪就有意思多了，但是流程太短3个小时通关。
this game is very good it entails shooting,

I enjoy Half-Life 2 because, although the mutant creatures weren't quite my favourite part, the storyline and gameplay were the best part along with testing out cool gadgets like the Gravity Gun. I definitely recommend the game for those looking for something new to play on Steam that is the fantasy and action and adventure type.
Absolutely incredible gameplay, the story line is interesting. A good balance between supplies and enemies as well.

La estética, narrativa en tiempo real y la historia envolvente de este video juego consigue formar una atmósfera incomparable y bella, para más información vean los videos de DayoScript y Alejandro Julián

This game is a masterpiece, the OST is amazing and gives the feeling of horror, shock, braveness, and pure badassery. The enemies are amazing, down to the voicelines. The truly immersing world sucks you in and gets you hyped for the ending. The combine are evil. The most amazing thing is the zombies, the gun fire, The beautiful music. i was truly immersed for the whole thing ravenholm wasn't very scary but it was very dramatic. The wide variety of weapons adds to the feeling of a world long gone. (also i got killed by a box once.) whether it'd be the combine sniper shouting shit or the zombie screaming yabba my icing. This game always stands out to me. Ah, the day i got it. December of 2 or 1 years ago...........  i told my older brother about it. and started playing. I loved it. i didn't stop. thank you for this amazing game. I still remember going to ravenholm and beating the game. I immediately bought half life straight after i got half life 2. then episodes one and two. anyways buy this game. you won't regret it. sadly im experiencing a slight technical glitch where only if i hold my lmb or rmb down i can look around. so, please get half life 2. The enemies are wonderfully designed. the combine are very tactical. The zombies are slow shambling abominations. The fight in the citadel is remarkable. thanks.
